version_description:
In this version of the Synchrony Bank app, you can:
•Tap the widget to go directly to your dashboard or your account, depending on which balance you choose.
•Set up recurring transfers to and from accounts at other banks without an end date specified.
•See images of the checks you’ve remote-deposited in your transaction history.
•Chat with our friendly, award-winning customer support team.
•Use an even simpler date picker to schedule transactions if you use VoiceOver.
•Receive a helpful hint from the Sign In screen if you haven't logged in recently and need to update your password.

This latest update to the Synchrony Bank app gives you:
• In-app access to create and edit your account nickname
• Multiple navigation enhancements for VoiceOver users

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• Notification on your dashboard when your external accounts are ready for microdeposits
• The option to now add an external account from inside our transfer flow
• Enhanced functionality to link to specific areas or platforms from within the app

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• Updates to the App UI to improve functionality for users.

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• The ability to open an account directly through the app in just minutes, whether you’re a new or existing customer.
• Functionality to add external accounts quickly and securely for easier funding and transfer activity.
• Additional security measures to help keep your information secure.

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• Faster account opening for most new Synchrony Bank customers
• Timely notifications for pertinent features and functionality
• Additional deep linking for even easier navigation
• Seamless integration of Synchrony Mastercard account servicing

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
•An improved interface on the app dashboard
•Better sign in screen navigation
•Ability to linkout to Synchrony Bank statements from the app
•Nickname edits to allow for easier identification of accounts
•iOS 13 feature updates

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
•A quick link to renew on the mobile web when your CD is within 30 days of maturing
•Even easier navigation to the most helpful features
•Improved Customer Alerts

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
•A new menu of helpful shortcuts from the icon into our most-used features
•Streamlined updates to the account funding process
•Informational updates for our CD customers

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
•Even more control to renew your maturing CDs in-app
•Upgraded information security measures

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• General security updates

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• Ability to view bank statements in-app
• Updated Bankers' Hours

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• The ability to retrieve Username or Password directly within the app.
• Functionality that allows for quick and easy access to statements.
• Fast access to Go Paperless setting on the mobile site.

Our latest update to the Synchrony Bank mobile app gives you:
• An updated transfer flow with easier navigation.
• Dark Mode support on eligible devices, allowing lower battery usage and improved visibility.
• The option to add emojis into your account nicknames.
